title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 34-2.15 - Loans
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 34-2.15 - Loans

State Regulations

Any loan for the benefit of a referring health services purveyor or for the benefit of any immediate family member of such purveyor, which was secured or facilitated either directly or indirectly by or through the efforts of a clinical laboratory shall be deemed consideration given for referral of specimens for performance of clinical laboratory services, and is prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
34-2.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
